main event: A civilian observed a bright blue-white light ball in the sky which was thought to be a prototype jet aircraft.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 3 minutes., The object emitted a bright light with a red spark-like surrounding glow., The light dimmed and disappeared to the north before a green light appeared from the south., The light was estimated to be 5,000 ft high and exhibited slow speed., A conventional airplane was sighted a few minutes after the object disappeared, providing contrast for comparison.
witness description: a 33-year-old plant manager, described as reliable
